description: three strips of tan fabric sewn together; predominately rust-colored embroidery; dense designs at ends with foliate designs in boxes; side borders of similar foliate designs and diamonds with similar motifs; large off-center hexagon near center with similar motifs to borders; 15 smaller hexagons and eight partial hexagons; black fringe
marks:
Inscription

on back at one corner, in blue ink:
title: Head cover
